author: jacopoc
msg: Unified all the different variants of *-containers.xml files into one; this has been made possible because now you can declare the container loaders in the startup properties; also moved some container definitions from base/config to the proper component.
It is now very easy to control the way containers are loaded.

author: cschneider
msg: KARAF-1385 Move default Jaas Realm config for karaf into a separate module so it can be disabled
